wsipre in 5 minutes¶

wsipre (Whole-Slide Image PREprocessing) is a wrapper of the excellent OpenSlide Python package, which allows reading whole-slide images (WSI), also known as virtual slides. wsipre conserves OpenSlide Python’s API and extends it to handle WSI annotations and to perform some slide processing tasks. The driving objective is the preprocessing of WSIs, with or without annotations, for Machine Learning (ML), particularly Deep Learning (DL), applications.
